story-context.title: User Benchmarking Dashboard
story-context.summary: Create a comprehensive dashboard for running custom instruction benchmarks with real-time execution, comparative analysis, and performance optimization recommendations.

requirements.functional: Interactive dashboard for creating and running custom instruction benchmarks Real-time benchmark execution with progress tracking and live results Comparative analysis showing baseline vs custom instruction performance Provider comparison tools with side-by-side performance metrics Custom instruction editor with syntax highlighting and validation Historical benchmark tracking with trend analysis and performance insights Export capabilities for sharing benchmark results and insights Integration with cross-platform intelligence for optimization recommendations
requirements.non-functional: Support for 1000+ concurrent users with responsive performance Mobile-first responsive design with progressive enhancement Real-time updates using WebSocket or Server-Sent Events WCAG accessibility compliance with keyboard navigation Performance optimization with lazy loading and virtual scrolling Efficient data visualization for large benchmark datasets Caching for fast result loading and historical data access

technical-context.architecture: Real-time dashboard architecture using React with TypeScript WebSocket/SSE integration for live benchmark progress updates Component-based architecture with separation of concerns Comparative analysis engine for baseline vs custom instruction comparison Historical analytics system with trend analysis and regression detection Multi-format export system (JSON, CSV, PDF) with shareable reports Cross-platform intelligence API integration for optimization recommendations
technical-context.dependencies: Story 4.5: Benchmark Execution Engine for core benchmarking functionality Story 4.6: Cross-Platform Intelligence for optimization recommendations Existing benchmark systems and data stores Real-time communication infrastructure (WebSocket/SSE) User authentication and authorization systems Performance monitoring and alerting infrastructure
technical-context.apis: POST /api/benchmarks/custom - Create and execute custom instruction benchmarks GET /api/benchmarks/:id/progress - Real-time benchmark progress tracking GET /api/benchmarks/:id/results - Retrieve benchmark results and comparisons POST /api/benchmarks/compare - Compare multiple benchmark results GET /api/analytics/trends - Historical trend analysis and insights POST /api/export/benchmark - Export benchmark results in multiple formats GET /api/intelligence/recommendations - Optimization recommendations from cross-platform intelligence WebSocket /ws/benchmarks/:id - Real-time benchmark execution updates

acceptance-criteria.criteria: Interactive dashboard for creating and running custom instruction benchmarks Real-time benchmark execution with progress tracking and live results Comparative analysis showing baseline vs custom instruction performance Provider comparison tools with side-by-side performance metrics Custom instruction editor with syntax highlighting and validation Historical benchmark tracking with trend analysis and performance insights Export capabilities for sharing benchmark results and insights Integration with cross-platform intelligence for optimization recommendations

implementation-notes.considerations: Use modern React framework with TypeScript for type safety and component reusability Implement efficient data visualization libraries for large benchmark datasets Design responsive layout that works seamlessly on mobile and desktop devices Create modular component architecture for maintainability and testing Implement comprehensive error handling and user feedback mechanisms Design caching strategy for frequently accessed historical data Ensure real-time updates are efficient and don't overwhelm the client Create intuitive onboarding experience for new users
implementation-notes.challenges: Handling real-time updates for 1000+ concurrent users without performance degradation Efficient visualization of large benchmark datasets with multiple dimensions Maintaining responsive UI during intensive benchmark computations Ensuring data consistency across real-time updates and historical views Implementing effective comparative analysis algorithms for performance metrics Creating intuitive instruction editor that supports multiple provider formats Balancing feature richness with performance and usability Integrating external intelligence APIs while maintaining dashboard responsiveness
